channel.title: When i try to run my server....Theres A Reward
channel.description:
When i try to run my server i click the run program.Ether it dosint come up or it says this: 'JAVA' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .
To let u know i just got rid of a trojam cus a freaking file gave me one. I have redownloaded java 6 update 7 or do i need jdk 6 update 6...........Please help me with this-------------------------Thank You.-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------NOTE:WHO EVER HELPS ME WITH THIS GETS A REP++

item.title: When i try to run my server....Theres A Reward
item.dc:creator: @Shoplifter0 Shoplifter0

@Shoplifter0 wrote:

my moms ganna wipe oe hardrive so that should make it work if it dosint work im giving up

Read full topic

item.title: When i try to run my server....Theres A Reward
item.dc:creator: @321legend123 321legend123
item.description:
@321legend123 wrote:

right click your run.bat and paste this in

@echo off
color 0a
title PUT YOUR TITLE HERE !!!!
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server

tell me if that works ?

Read full topic

item.source: When i try to run my server....Theres A Reward

item.title: When i try to run my server....Theres A Reward
item.dc:creator: @Shoplifter0 Shoplifter0
item.description:
@Shoplifter0 wrote:

[quote=“xstrxpurez, post:7, topic:220663”]ok… go to control panel then system and click on advanced… then go to enviromental variables… and click new or edit… on the classpath thing if u have 1 and add this CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
and on the path 1 which is on the system variables click on path and click edit or new and add this
C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin
and that should work.
^^
do that… i just explained how to do all of it[/quote]just did that it still does thatt damn ‘JAVA’ thing…

Read full topic
item.source: When i try to run my server....Theres A Reward

item.title: When i try to run my server....Theres A Reward
item.dc:creator: @xstrxpurez xstrxpurez
item.description:
@xstrxpurez wrote:

ok… go to control panel then system and click on advanced… then go to enviromental variables… and click new or edit… on the classpath thing if u have 1 and add this CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
and on the path 1 which is on the system variables click on path and click edit or new and add this
C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin
and that should work.
^^
do that… i just explained how to do all of it

Read full topic

item.source: When i try to run my server....Theres A Reward

item.title: When i try to run my server....Theres A Reward
item.dc:creator: @xstrxpurez xstrxpurez
item.description:
@xstrxpurez wrote:

he has jdk 6u7 which is wat i got and wat i did is alot better bc then u wont have to worry about changing ur run.bat everytime u get a new source…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 16, 2008, 01:25:54 AM[/size][hr]ok… go to control panel then system and click on advanced… then go to enviromental variables… and click new or edit… on the classpath thing if u have 1 and add this CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
and on the path 1 which is on the system variables click on path and click edit or new and add this
C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin
and that should work.

Read full topic

item.title: When i try to run my server....Theres A Reward
item.dc:creator: @agent_nukks agent nukks
item.description:
@agent_nukks wrote:

Or you could just change your run.bat, which si waht you should be using to run your server, so give that a go, and if not, get a different one, right click “edit” delete everything in that run.bat file, and paste yours in there.
